item.title: Method
item.description: A function that has been bound to a class instance. Example: Calling a function: myFunction() // function Calling a method: class MyClass { fun myFunction() {} } instance = new MyClass() instance.myFunction()

item.title: Class
item.description: Related to object-oriented programming. A class is a language construct that allows binding data to methods. Example Below is an example class for a game, written in Kotlin. In this example, QuestService handles responsibilities related to questing. The class initializes with a list of possible quests.
